reviewText: My daughter loves these DVDs!! They are so well done, and I highly recommend these to everyone. It was very hard to find a really well done series for kids.
all Christian homes at a minimum should have these.  even those with no faith.  they really entertain and the kids love them.  much better than the secular garbage out today.

The Nest videos are always good to keep the children's attention in Kids Church or Sunday School.  Sometimes the content is not 100% accurate from the Bible but it is very close.  I would recommend these to families and Sunday School teachers.
Came in time. Packaged nicely and had the plastic still on DVDs. Love learning about the bible and this is a great animation of the bible and its good for children

These movies along with the Animated Book of Mormon movies are the most divinely created scriptural videos ever made. They're precisely accurate to Mormon doctrine all while keeping it fun and witty. I have used them to personally rekindle my understanding of the scriptures and will continue to use them throughout my entire life to better enable myself in serving others and "feeding thy sheep".
